Use of this material implies that you accept the BARON end-user license agreement
available in BARON EULA.pdf in this archive. 

To use BARON, extract the contents of this archive in a directory of your choice.
It is preferred that you place this directory in your PATH.  

The BARON executable contained herein needs no license key in order to handle 
problems with up to 10 variables, 10 constraints, and 50 nonlinear operations.
Larger problems require a license file to be obtained from www.minlp.com.
Place this license file in your PATH.

For more information about BARON, see http://www.minlp.com
